Summary: I observed 10-15 amber/orange colored lights floating or flying upwards and into the wind.
divs: sighting detailsi am a police field sergeant, while working on friday 10\24\08 at about 10:20pm i was parked in a parking lot in the downtown indpls. area since it was a slow night. over the downtown horizon and in what appeared the be the northeast quadrant of marion county (indianapolis), at what appeared to be about 10 miles away from my location, i observed about 10-15 circular, amber\orange lights, floating or flying upwards and into the wind. i could not tell if these objects were leaving the ground or just rising from a lower altitude because of my view being obstructed from the buildings downtown and the horizon in general. initially i saw 3 of these objects rising, they looked like they were equally spaced apart, but at different altitudes. i dont believe it was one unit, but rather 3 seperate objects. about 20 seconds or so after the first 3, i observed 3-4 more of these objects ascending in the same manner as the first 3. then shortly after, i observe about 6-8 more of the same type objects following the same path. i dont believe they were hot air or helium balloons because i wouldnt think they would fly into the wind, however i am no expert and they may be capable of just this. it was a somewhat rainy and cloudly night, however not raining at the time, but after they objects got so high i could no longer observe them. i am not sure if this was due to the clouds blocking my view, the lights going or buring out or some other reason. i did not see any mention of this on the local news. i also seen what appeared to be a commerical aircraft heading towards the objects path. the aircraft and wind was going from west to east, and the amber lighted objects were going from east to west at a somewhat gradual pace or variance. the objects cleared the aircrafts path about 20-30 seconds prior to the aircraft arriving in the area. i assume the aircraft had just left the indianapolis international airport, located on the westside of indianapolis. i also sent an email to the indianapolis star to inquire as to whether any one else has reported these objects or if there might have been a legitimate reason for their presence, but so far i have not heard back. i attempted to take cellphone camera picture and video but you cant see the objects due to poor camera quality in cellphones. again maybe these were balloons or something else not unusual, but i have seen this before. i also want to mention that several hours later i did see what is mistakenly called a "shooting star" in the same direction as the objects. this was unusual to me because of my earlier sighting as well as the fact that this one appeared to be brighter and close to the ground than any previous shooting star i have seen before. i know they really arent stars, but rather meteorite pieces or somthing like that. but the shooting star could just be a coincidence. thank you in advance for your time and consideration in this matter. hopefully it gets figured out and its some simple explanation.
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There was one other sighting in Indianapolis on or around October 24th 2008
